Html: the newest rawr, seems to Value spirit over Mp5, example the frost emblem cloaks, 60 spirit is valued higher than the 30 mp5 in sustained and burst, they are same crit/int/sp on either cloak... Why?
Why do you think it's valuing Spirit? Are you sure you're looking at the RestoSham model?

They may have the same stats and the same socket bonuses, but different sockets.  The MP5 cloak has a blue socket, meaning you will most likely just put whatever gem you want in it, where the Spirit cloak has a yellow socket meaning you will most likely be able to get the socket bonus and a good gem as well.

You are most likely right though, Spirit and MP5 have the same value for you.  0.  You can see this by going to the relative stats pane, and notice that MP5 is probably not even on the screen.
